title: The Wizard of Oz [DVD]
creator_credit: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Mervyn LeRoy and Victor Fleming
brief_description: This 50th Anniversary Commemorative Edition of the “Wizard of Oz” is as it was originally released in 1939, including the Kansas scenes in warm sepia tones. Featuring film clips and reconstructed musical numbers cut from the original film, this beautifully restored technicolour print is a tribute to the popularity of “The Wizard of Oz” with adults and children alike.
